subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|馬|主|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

[[駐]] have a meaning similar to [[住]] but in a military context.
The semantic [[馬]] (horse) suggests a military context.
